koohiiStory1: The part of the sky that is responsible for weather and rain is known as the atmosphere. It only occupies part of the sky though.
koohiiStory2: (This is atmosphere as in ambiance, mood). Rain is only part of the atmosphere for a romantic porch date. Food, music, and candles are the rest.
words: 雰囲気(ふんいき): atmosphere (e.g. musical), mood, ambience
